name: Beauty's Assistant
description:
In this erotic visual novel game you play as a young lad who just got a dream job of being a personal assistant to a famous and beautiful movie star called Shaqeera Cruz.
The main protagonists starts his 3 week probation period at Shaqeera's mansion during which he won't just be carrying out the tasks she gives him but also interacting with her and the other helpers employed in her mansion which include her maid Polly and security guard Steve. There will also be more NPCs visiting the mansion as you progress through the game.

When making this VN we're not just focusing on sexy visuals (which is very important of course) but also on creating a captivating story line that will keep you hooked and make you crave for the next release to come out!

Our first version is playable for about 20-25 minutes. We're planning to add extra 25-30 minutes of content every 3-4 weeks.

If you like the game and would like to support our work on future updates you can do that on patreon: 

https://www.patreon.com/velvetparadisegames

Any contribution is welcome even if it's just spreading the word about our game! :)
